name: Virtually Live presents Formula E Season Two Highlights
detailed_description:
Introducing Virtually Live, the true VR company, where fans can watch live events in virtual venues as if they were there, but better. In Virtually Live, fans never miss a live event and easily find the best location to watch with friends. We transform the traditional viewing experience by giving users the ability to be an active participant in the experience.

Virtually Live tracks live events in real-time and recreates them in fully-rendered virtual environments, delivering the best fan experience. Users can join their friends online to watch live events from; the VIP room, the driver's seat, the stands, or even in the pit lane!

Key Features:
-Experience Live events in VR
-Freedom of movement through teleportation giving you, the fan, an all access pass
-Ability to create your own viewing experience
-Realism of event supported by other live media: audio from athletes or cars, tv broadcasts, commentary
-Socialize with friends, family, and other fans
-Feel the sense of visiting real world venues and events
-Grip the controller sides to snap TV feed to controller
-Dual controller navigation for more immersive interaction
-Increase pitlane access

short_description: Virtually Live enables fans to attend LIVE VR events from anywhere in the world. Watch from any position including on the track and share the experience with friends and other fans through robust social features.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-5930K or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
